items.name: case image
items.desc: The image is presented in its actual size.

items.name: case fullscreen
items.desc: The image occupies the entire screen.

items.name: case decoration
items.desc: The image is a decoration image, which is used to display an image inside of another image.

items.name: case hero
items.desc: The image is a hero image, which is used to display a product image.
